description:
Chidori and Sukezo go to visit Hideyoshi, who has gotten sick. While they`re there, Hideyoshi`s friend, Nene, barges in. It seems that Nene secretly has feelings for Hideyoshi, but Hideyoshi likes Nobunaga`s younger sister, Oichi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Monkey and the Tsundere Girl
